planning.title: Fight Nation: Police & Law Enforcement Brotherhood Gala
planning.description: On March 29, MMA fights for a cause! Fight Nation and the Police Brotherhood unite for an intense fight night under the patronage of champion Jimmy Vienot. Experience a unique event where elite law enforcement members step into the cage for charity.

planning.title: French Badminton Top 12 Finals
planning.description: Featuring the four best interclub badminton teams in France.

planning.title: Tek Fight 5
planning.description: On May 23 at Jesse Owens Gymnasium, the cage returns with MMA, a rapidly growing discipline continuing the legacy of Muay Thai and kickboxing, historic pillars of the local club.

planning.title: French National Handball League: PSG Handball vs HBC Nantes
planning.description: On May 27, 2026, Paris Saint-Germain Handball and HBC Nantes will face each other at the Accor Arena in Paris during the 28th round of Liqui Moly StarLigue. A top-level clash that could be decisive in the title race, with PSG currently only two points ahead of Nantes.

planning.title: Yonex French Open Badminton
planning.description: The world's best players will gather once again for a new edition of the Yonex French Open Badminton tournament.
